m_szDocTitle: My Tesla Model X 90D Test Drive -- This SUV Blows Me Away! (Videos) | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: April 12th, 2016 by Zachary Shahan   Photo of Don’s Tesla Model X, courtesy Kyle Field The Tesla Model X is actually quite different from the Model S. That was one of the key takeaways for Kyle and me while test driving the electric SUV in Santa Barbara. Below is a video combining my first drive in a Model X and Kyle Field’s first drive in a Model X (thanks to Don Baumhefner for bringing it down from Northern California for us to test out!) as well as some videos of a titanium metallic Model X at a Supercharger station and Gene Liu’s black Model X, which we explored at Unplugged Performance on
